quiz.quizQuestion: Which HTML element is used to put image on a webpage?

What do you need to do to allow users to select only one option from many others in the input type radio?
options: set id attribute of all options to the same value
set name attribute of all options to the same value
set class attribute of all options to the same value
there's no way to do it
quiz.correctAnswer: set name attribute of all options to the same value
